description: gray Reply text button at the start of the comment action bar

metadata.thought: I need to locate the "Reply" button associated with each comment in order to interact with them. Upon examining the screenshot, I notice that there are several comments displayed under the "Community" section. Each comment has a "Reply" button located at the start of its action bar. To proceed with my task, I will click on this gray "Reply" text button for the first comment.
